snippet: Lawmakers are nearing an agreement that would “fast-track” the sweeping trade deal the Obama administration is negotiating with a dozen Pacific nations.
abstract: Negotiators from House and Senate near agreement that would fast-track sweeping trade deal that the Obama administration is negotiating with dozen Pacific nations.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers are nearing an agreement that would “fast-track” the sweeping trade deal the Obama administration is negotiating with a dozen Pacific nations.
